participant_abstract.sent: The four members of the team made brief presentations on what they had found through their research.
Concepts for what the remote would be made of were dicussed as were considerations of cost, inclusion of advanced function, and voice recognition.
It was ultimately concluded that we should design a small-sized remote control that was not of traditional remote control form that would include voice recognition technology.
The focus would be on simple function with the option of more advanced function.

participant_actions.sent: The UID and ID will develop a working prototype of the remote control.
I will attempt to make a final decision on costs and benefits.
The ME will provide information on market data.

participant_decisions.sent: The touchscreen design was dropped in favour of voice recognition.
The shape was decided to be non-remote like and built with rubber with 'gives' and multiple case colours.
An emphasis was placed on simple function to appease the majority of users with the option of advanced functions being limited.

participant_problems.sent: No major issues were encountered, though I did fail to address some of the ideas presented when we opened the meeting up for discussion of various ideas.
